attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Smoking is a human right and so long as there are no smoking and smoking areas in public places smokers should be allowed to smoke! The government already take 75% in taxes from the smoker they are not second class citizens and should not have to be thrown outside in order to smoke. STOP THIS NOW!

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not simply your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
